name: Eastwind Adventures: Chapter 1
storyline:
Things are stirring in the lands of Eastwind. Great powers are awakening, some good, some evil, and all are drawn towards the mysterious islands in the east.

The strange, enchanted mists that covered these islands and kept them hidden, are withdrawing, and what is unveiled, will change the future of Eastwind forever.

Play as a young adventurer on a path to greatness, as a young sorceress who is just beginning to discover her power, and as an evil wizard with the ambition to become the most evil wizard in the world!

This is the first chapter of the Eastwind saga.
summary: Eastwind Adventures Chapter 1 is a game of storytelling and adventure for all ages. Go on a great quest with three different heroes, some good, some not so good, and uncover the mysteries and magic of the lands of Eastwind!
